mobi.inventica.ifinitysdk.managers

Class IFLocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobi.inventica.ifinitysdk.managers.IFLocationManager

  • public class IFLocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class IFLocationManager, used for precise navigation between two points.

      • ifNavigatingFinished

        public boolean ifNavigatingFinished()
        this method checks if user got to the destination point (when he is within 0.5 meter radius of the last point)
        Returns:
        true, if user gets to the destination point, false if otherwise

      • getNodeDescription

        public java.lang.String getNodeDescription()
        This method returns descriptions of the closest node.
        Returns:
        the node description, if there is no description within this node, method returns empty string

      • getCurrentRoute

                                                                         int currentFloor)
        This method returns the current route.
        Parameters:
        currentPos - current position of the user
        currentFloor - current floor ID user is currently on
        Returns:
        the current route
        See Also:
        PolylineOptions

      • ifReroute

        public boolean ifReroute()
        This method check is there a need to query new route, if user has departed too far from current route. Usually it's 5 meters.
        Returns:
        true, if there is a need to query another route (user has departed too far from the route)
